availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John F. Gasner (Scott County, Kentucky, boot manufacturer)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, boot manufacturer. Native of France. Son of Francis Gasner and [Unknown] Biurhaus Gasner. Married to Sarah "Sallie" F. Chambers Gasner. Father of Sophia A. Gasner, Eugene L. Gasner, and Emma Gasner. Boot manufacturer in Scott County in 1850. Boot manufacturer in Scott County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person for H. Wood in Scott County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, Georgetown, p. 397A.
